name: Bobo's Invisible Adventures
description: This game works best on PC's. Mobile devices aren't supported well. The game might not work on mobile. This was made for the first ever game jam I participated in. The "Weekly Game Jam 147" on itch.io This was just an attempt to learn how game jams work. Nothing special. The theme is 'Invisible'. I don't expect to win anything but it was fun trying this out. Been a while since I used Sploder so I decided this would be a great chance to give it a go. You play as a Robot named Bobo. He needs to find all the coins but they're invisible. Can you help him find them all in a timely manner?
